key.name: panel-placement
key.description: Position to place extension at. 0 - default, 1 - replace calendar, 2 - replace activities, 3 - Center, next to calendar.

key.name: panel-appearance
key.description: Sets the panel appearance. 0 - label, 1 - icon, 2 - label and icon.

key.name: show-summary
key.description: Whether to display a summary of today's categories.

key.name: show-hamster-dropdown
key.summary: Global key combination to show the drop-down.
